title: Projects
description: View and manage all Claude projects
clearRemovedConfirmDescription:
This will permanently delete all removed projects.

Note: This will only delete the configuration records in the AI tool, not the actual project files.

This action cannot be undone.
noProjectsDesc: No Claude projects found. Click the refresh button to scan for projects.
noSearchResultsDescBoth: No favorite projects match "{{query}}". Try a different search term or filter.
noSearchResultsDescSearch: No projects match "{{query}}". Try a different search term.
noSearchResultsDescFilter: No favorite projects found. Try showing all projects.

detail.notFoundDesc: The specified project could not be found. Please check if the project ID is correct.

user.label: User
user.description: User global configuration, applies to all projects

project.label: Project
project.description: Project-level configuration, applies only to the current project

local.label: Local
local.description: Project local configuration, applies to the local instance of the current project

scopeBadge.noValue: Configuration value is empty, cannot change scope
scopeBadge.cannotChangeScope: Configuration value is empty or updating, cannot change scope

settings.settingsNotFound: Settings file does not exist or is empty

environment.title: Environment Variables
environment.description: Configure environment variables required for project runtime, such as API keys, HTTP_PROXY, proxy settings, etc.
environment.currentScope: Currently showing environment variables for {{scope}} scope.

user.title: User (User Global Configuration)
user.description: User global environment variables, shared by all projects

validation.invalidName: Variable name must consist of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores, and start with a letter or underscore

project.title: Project (Project Configuration)
project.description: Project-level environment variables, exclusive to this project

validation.invalidName: Variable name must consist of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores, and start with a letter or underscore

local.title: Local (Local Configuration)
local.description: Local environment variables with highest priority, not committed to version control

validation.invalidName: Variable name must consist of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores, and start with a letter or underscore

model.title: model
model.description: Specify the AI model used by Claude, such as claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929

alwaysThinkingEnabled.title: alwaysThinkingEnabled
alwaysThinkingEnabled.description: Makes Claude think deeply and plan before each response, enabling this will affect response speed

permissions.title: Permissions Settings
permissions.subtitle: Control Claude's permission system and access restrictions

controlList.title: Permission Control List
controlList.description: Define which operations are allowed, asked, or denied

allow.title: allow
allow.description: These operations will be allowed without confirmation

ask.title: ask
ask.description: These operations will require user confirmation before execution

deny.title: deny
deny.description: These operations will be prohibited from execution

modeConfig.title: Permission Mode Configuration
modeConfig.description: Control the behavior mode of the permission system

defaultMode.title: defaultMode
defaultMode.description: Set Claude's default permission behavior mode

disableBypassPermissionsMode.title: disableBypassPermissionsMode
disableBypassPermissionsMode.description: Control whether to disable permission bypass functionality

additionalDirectories.title: Additional Access Directories
additionalDirectories.description: Configure additional paths to allow access
additionalDirectories.description2: Additional directory paths that Claude is allowed to access

sandbox.title: Sandbox Settings
sandbox.subtitle: Execute operations in a restricted environment to improve security

enabled.title: enabled
enabled.description: Execute operations in a restricted environment to improve security

sandbox.enabledMessage: Sandbox mode is enabled. The following settings will control the specific behavior of the sandbox environment
sandbox.notEnabledDescription: Current runtime status of sandbox mode
sandbox.notEnabledDetail: After enabling sandbox mode, you can configure the specific behavior of the sandbox environment, including command execution permissions, network access restrictions, and other security settings.

commandControl.title: Command Execution Control
commandControl.description: Control command execution behavior in the sandbox environment

autoAllowBashIfSandboxed.title: autoAllowBashIfSandboxed
autoAllowBashIfSandboxed.description: Automatically allow Bash command execution in sandbox environment

allowUnsandboxedCommands.title: allowUnsandboxedCommands
allowUnsandboxedCommands.description: Allow execution of specific commands in non-sandboxed environments

enableWeakerNestedSandbox.title: enableWeakerNestedSandbox
enableWeakerNestedSandbox.description: Use weaker sandbox restrictions in nested environments

excludedCommands.title: Excluded Commands List
excludedCommands.description: Configure commands that cannot be executed in the sandbox
excludedCommands.description2: Commands excluded from execution in the sandbox
excludedCommands.placeholder: Enter command name, e.g., rm, sudo

validation.invalidName: Command name can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens

network.title: Network Access Control
network.subtitle: Control network access permissions in the sandbox environment

allowLocalBinding.title: allowLocalBinding
allowLocalBinding.description: Allow binding to local network ports in the sandbox

httpProxyPort.title: httpProxyPort
httpProxyPort.description: Set the port number for the HTTP proxy service

socksProxyPort.title: socksProxyPort
socksProxyPort.description: Set the port number for the SOCKS proxy service

allowUnixSockets.title: allowUnixSockets
allowUnixSockets.description: Unix socket paths allowed in the sandbox

validation.invalidPath: Please enter a valid Unix socket path (ending with .sock)

card.deleteConfirmDescription:
Are you sure you want to delete "{{projectName}}"?

Note: This will only delete the configuration record in the AI tool, not the actual project files.

This action cannot be undone.
card.permanentlyDeleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{{projectName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

memory.title: Claude Memory
memory.description: Manage Claude AI memory files and context configuration

mcpServers.title: MCP Servers
mcpServers.description: Configure and manage Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers

lspServers.title: LSP Servers
lspServers.description: View Language Server Protocol (LSP) servers from plugins

commands.title: Commands
commands.description: Create and manage custom Slash commands

subAgents.title: Sub Agents
subAgents.description: Configure sub-agents with specific tools and permissions

hooks.title: Hooks
hooks.description: Setup system event hooks and automation triggers

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Define and load reusable AI skill packages

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.description: Manage and configure Claude plugin extensions

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Global app settings and personalized configuration

memory.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to switch?

commands.noSelectionDesc: Select a command from the dropdown above to edit it, or create a new one to get started.
commands.pluginScopeDesc: Commands in the plugin scope are provided by plugins. Please go to the Plugins page to manage plugin commands.
commands.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete command "{{name}}"?

skills.noSelectionDesc: Select a skill from the dropdown above to edit it, or create a new one to get started.
skills.pluginScopeDesc: Skills in the plugin scope are provided by plugins. Please go to the Plugins page to manage plugin skills.
skills.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete skill "{{name}}"?

subAgents.noSelectionDesc: Select an agent from the dropdown above to edit it, or create a new one to get started.
subAgents.pluginScopeDesc: Agents in the plugin scope are provided by plugins. Please go to the Plugins page to manage plugin agents.
subAgents.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete agent "{{name}}"?

hookDialog.editScopeDisabled: Cannot modify scope in edit mode
hookDialog.timeoutDescription: Optional, leave empty for no timeout
hookDialog.matcherPlaceholder: Enter matcher expression, e.g., tool_name or pattern
hookDialog.matcherDescription: Expression to limit Hook trigger conditions, leave empty to match all
hookDialog.executeCommandPlaceholder: Enter bash command to execute, e.g., echo "Hello World"
hookDialog.executeCommandDescription: This bash command will be executed when Hook triggers
hookDialog.llmPromptPlaceholder: Enter prompt content to send to LLM
hookDialog.llmPromptDescription: This prompt will be used to call LLM for evaluation when Hook triggers

mcpServerItem.cannotEditOverride: This server is overridden by higher priority configuration, cannot edit

mcpServerItem.cannotEnableOverride: This server is overridden by higher priority configuration, cannot modify enabled state

mcpServerItem.readonlyMode: Plugin-provided configuration is readonly and cannot be modified
